text: Rayman Raving Rabbids is a party video game made by Ubisoft for the Wii, PlayStation 2, Xbox 360, Microsoft Windows, Game Boy Advance, and Nintendo DS game consoles. It's a spin-off of the Rayman series where Rayman has to thwart the Rabbids, the bad guys of the game, playing mini-games to do this. The Game Boy Advance and DS versions are platform games like older Rayman titles with less mini-games. ==References== Category:2006 video games Category:Rayman Category:Ubisoft games Category:PlayStation Portable games Category:Game Boy Advance games Category:Nintendo DS games Category:Party video games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:Wii games Category:Windows games Category:Xbox 360 games Category:Video game spin-offs Category:Video games about rabbits and hares
title: Rayman Raving Rabbids
